[Sorcery]
It is a technique created by humans to manipulate magic.
Magic is...

It is one of the ultimate elements that constitutes the origin of all
things, just like the physical laws that govern the natural world.

Sorcery is an academic term that systematizes it based on certain
theories.

It was one of the academic disciplines, just like mathematics,
history, and political science.

Unlike swordsmanship and physical techniques, it is difficult for
those who are not academically inclined to master powerful sorcery.

On the contrary, those with sharp intellect were able to master
powerful sorcery.
Magic Academy
It is the pinnacle place to study sorcery.

In the city of Castania, where the Magic Academy is located, a certain
incident is currently occurring...

[Principal] Actually... there have been a series of disappearances
among the apprentice candidates.

[Principal] Even with all the teachers from the Academy searching, they
couldn't be found...

[Principal] In the event that something were to happen to the students,
I would be at a complete loss.

[Principal] Even if it is said to be one of the most prestigious
schools in our country, if we cannot protect the safety of our
students, our reputation will be tarnished.
saidai1
saidai1
[Anastasia] I see...
[Anastasia] Understood. I will confirm that incident.
saidai1
[Principal] What? Anastasia-sama is coming to visit?
saidai1
saidai1
[Anastasia] Yes.
[Anastasia] I was also enrolled in the Magic Academy until last year.
[Anastasia] As a graduate, I cannot overlook this.
[Anastasia] Is that alright, Father?
saidai1
[Gwen] Ah, I was also deeply concerned about that incident.
[Gwen] If you're going, then there's nothing to worry about.
[Principal] Oh, how grateful.
